title: Game constantly having File Corruption every time I start a game.
body:
Normally at the start of a new game right at the loading screen it crashes and at the end of it before it shows endgame overall stats it crashes.
Should I just fully reinstall league since it's being garbage?

replies.body:
If you're seeing a lot of corruption errors and having to repair a lot, it's generally an indication there are severe corruptions that aren't being fully repaired. In this instance, I recommend completing a *clean reinstallation* of League with our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs). 

After installing our tool, open it up, check the boxes for both **'Reinstall'** and **'Clean uninstall'** and then hit the **START** button. After it's finished, go ahead and launch the client so being patching. 

If you encounter issues after the clean reinstall, please let me know.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
